actions.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the Senate from April 11, 12, or 13, 1984 to April 24, 1984 and an adjournment of the House from April 12, or 13, 1984 to April 24, 1984.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the Senate from April 11, 12, or 13 to April 24, 1984, and an adjournment of the House from April 12 or 13 to April 24, 1984.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the Senate from April 11, 12, or 13, 1984 to April 24, 1984 and an adjournment of the House from April 12, or 13, 1984 to April 24, 1984.
